SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Bill
Represents an immutable bill record for an order.
BillDAO
This class provides data access methods for Bill objects.
Client
Represents a client in the system with personal and contact information.
ClientBLL
This class handles the business logic related to operations on clients.
ClientDAO
Data Access Object for handling client-related database operations.
ConnectionFactory
The ConnectionFactory class is responsible for managing the database connection.
Controller
The Controller class handles user interactions, communicates with the BLL (Business Logic Layer), and updates the View accordingly.
EmailValidator
Validates the email format of a client using a regular expression pattern.
Order
Represents an order placed in the system.
OrderBLL
This class handles the business logic for orders within the application.
OrderDAO
Data Access Object for handling order-related database operations.
PriceValidator
This class implements the Validator interface and specifically validates the price of a Product object.
Product
Represents a product in the system.
ProductBLL
This class handles the business logic for products within the application.
ProductDAO
Data Access Object for handling product-related database operations.
ReflectionTableUtils
Utility class for creating table models using reflection.
Validator<T>
This interface defines a contract for validating objects of a generic type `T`.
View
The View class in the MVC pattern represents the visual representation of the data.
